mapper.select: SELECT a.review_idx, a.user_id, a.UC_SEQ, a.UC_SEQ2, a.contents, a.scope, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date, substring(b.image_url,24,30) as image_url FROM review_board a LEFT JOIN review_image b ON a.review_idx = b.review_idx where UC_SEQ = #{UCSEQ} ORDER BY create_date ASC LIMIT 1, 4
